message:
Guys, i started a young project 3 years ago that grew to be very popular now with couple million subscribers.
Its a restful api backend and has client webapp and mocbile app.

Question is what is the required documents/ restructure that i should do to the project in case i want to sell it to a big company ?

Is there any professionals who can help managing such projexts ? -7ad beyeshta3'al ma3 startups we ye7'alehom gahzen enohom yekbaro ?-

المشكله اني كذا حد عرض عليه انه يعملي incubation بس انا مش محتاج انكيباشن لان البروجكت شغال و ناجح خلاص.. انا محتاج بس احوله لانه يبقي شركه.. بس معنديش اي فكره المفروض ابداء من اين،

my question is there a biz-developers \ product management company fe misr ? 7ad keda zay Ryan Graves of uber :D ya7'od el company men enaha local we yesa3ed enaha te launch global scale

data.message: ابدأ بانك تعمل business plan للمشروع بتاعك
واعمل له business model canvas في الاول عشان تسهل على نفسك
بعد ما تخلص الBusiness Plan استشير محامي في الامور القانونية اللي تخص انشاء شركة

Hello Momen,
You can get incubation and consultation services for your project through Technology Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center TIEC(a governmental entity), I think they might help you in terms of establishing a company.

http://www.tiec.gov.eg/en-us/Pages/default.aspx

Ana already established a company couple years ago, my question is there a biz-developers \ product management company fe misr ? 7ad keda zay Ryan Graves of uber :D ya7'od el company men enaha local we yesa3ed enaha te launch global scale

Talk to investors, search for investors in Egypt, and reach some of them. and don't accept first offer, talk to as many as you can and then decide. and If your project target is global, reach global investors as well.

Apply at 500startups or YCombinator since you already have a successful product and good traction;  they'll help you learn the other business stuff; and there are a dozen of Egyptian and Arab startups got accepted already in previous batches and went to silicon valley
Do you need a business developer ?

I am happy to help if you'd like. If you're around the Greek Campus in Downtown we can have a chat. In short, the sale of the company is an outcome (and in all likelihood a very distant, low probability outcome) that you should not focus on. The focus should be on understanding more about the problem you are solving for your customers, coming up with a business model to make money from it and then coming up with a way to get even more customers.
if the application is healthcare related I can provide consultation for you in that, I have a good experience in healthcare information system product management
What industry/sector does your product serve?
طب ما ال incubation حلوه وفيه فلوس تبدأ بيها
See your inbox Dr Momen Al Zalabany :-)
